page.title: 10A Craft
page.content: My dad is a bricklayer. He builds houses and sometimes factories and flats.A bricklayer's nickname is a "bricky" and my dad has been a "bricky" all of his working life.The tools that he needs for his job are a spirit level,which tells him whether his bricks have been laid level or not;a trowel,which he uses to put the cement on the bricks,a pointing trowel to smooth the bed of mortar between each layer of bricks, and a lump hammer which he uses to knock a wall down or to make a hole in a wall. Mortar is used to hold the bricks together and is made from mixing sand,cement and water together. This can be done either by hand using a shovel or in a machine called a cement mixer. Bricklaying is a very skilled job and you have to train for a long time before you are good at it.
